title: Higher latitude chain (Lat 79.3, Long 76.5), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Vize Island, Russia, 1 min, AARI network - Oleg Troshichev (Department of Geophysics, Arctic and Antarctic Research Institute)

info.contact: Oleg Troshichev @ Department of Geophysics, Arctic and Antarctic Research Institute

parameters.name: thg_mag_viz
parameters.description: Magnetic field variation B in HDZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_viz
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_viz']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_viz
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_viz']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_viz
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_viz']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
